stake.welcomeBody: MyCryCoin has prepared 20% of the total initial issuance as a pledge reward. The distribution will be based on the pledge time, and the maximum reward can be up to 40%.
main.title: MyCryCoin - Best Buying Choice
main.body1: MyCryCoin is a mobile-based cryptocurrency earning currency that transforms groundbreaking online gaming memes into a modern payment currency. Buy $MCC tokens in the pre-sale to enjoy the strongest payment experience and stake to earn more cryptocurrency!
main.body3: In 2009, many players in My Little World were shocked by a mysterious NPC: an object whose prototype was a pig, which accidentally turned into a nightmare for all players. Panic spread in the community until one day, a strong player discovered a mysterious plan in an old, abandoned code. This plan was called 「MyCry」 and shone with mysterious charm.
main.body5: Feel the frightening explosion in my little world with your many friends by purchasing MyCryCoin. Buy $MCC tokens and earn rewards while playing!
main.right.title: Buy Before DEX Launch and Claim
CouldNotBeNull: The input quantity cannot be empty
GasNotEnough: Insufficient ETH, please make sure there is still more than 0.015 E after payment to cover on-chain fees
TokenNotEnough: Shortage of Tokens, request to secure the Tokens for the stake
alert.html.buyTokenWithETH.message: You are about to spend {buyAmount} E to buy {playAmount} $MCC
alert.html.buyToken.warning: Please note that exchange rates change over time and there may be an error in the actual quantity received.
alert.html.buyTokenWithUSDT.message: You are about to spend {buyAmount} U to buy {playAmount} $MCC
alert.title.stakeAmount: Please enter the amount you want to stake
alert.title.withdrawStake: You have {userStaked} $MCC stakes available for withdrawal
copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.body: Some images and page elements in this portfolio are sourced from the internet and are used solely for personal presentation and interview purposes. There is no commercial intent or plan to distribute. I respect the copyrights of all original creators and their works. If any copyright holder has concerns about my use of their content, please contact me, and I will remove the relevant content immediately.
